name: Dungeon Duo
description:
Dungeon Duo

Dungeon Duo is a strategic game in which you control two characters simultaneously, but be careful where you leave the enemies lying around, you might regret it later!

Controls InputActionW, A, S, DMovement Goal

The goal of the game is to reach the exit on each level with both characters to continue.

Notes

Keep in mind this game is only 2 levels long as it is the first game I have ever created.
